byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman, Alan Rappeport and John Surico contributed reporting. Kitty Bennett contributed research.

abstract: Donald J Trump, who will address American Israel Public Affairs Committee annual policy conference, may have to fight for support from influential voting block; despite his widely publicized support for Jewish community and Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu, some Jewish leaders have expressed concern about his statements against various religious and ethnic groups.
lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump, whose disregard for the sensitivities of various religious and ethnic groups has hit a nerve among Jewish organizations, faces a difficult sell Monday.

headline.main: Donald Trump Courts Wary Jewish Voters
headline.print_headline: Trump Courting Jewish Voters Wary of His Agenda and Bluster

snippet: Donald J. Trump, whose disregard for the sensitivities of various religious and ethnic groups has hit a nerve among Jewish organizations, faces a difficult sell Monday.
